DataElement.preferredName: Acute OIPN Measure 6 Experience Other Side Effects From Chemotherapy Treatment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether a person has experienced other side effects from chemotherapy treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Acute Oxaliplatin-Induced Peripheral Neuropathy Measure Experience Other Side Effects From Chemotherapy Treatment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire for measuring the severity of neuropathy symptoms that a patient is experiencing following chemotherapy with oxaliplatin._A question about whether an individual experienced other side effects from chemotherapy treatment that was not mentioned.
